record.dc:title: 97BN12 Eva, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 6BN141, adult female in fair condition, fully flexed on right side with head to the west. Square 52R2. Direction East.
record.wpa:narrative: This individual is very tightly flexed and must have been bound into position. It seems somewhat incredible that no pit were associated in such a burial and I think it should be presumed that a pit existed but was not seen in the dark midden soil.
